com.percussion.pso.utils
Class PSORequestContext

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.server.PSRequestContext
      com.percussion.pso.utils.PSORequestContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.percussion.server.IPSRequestContext
public class PSORequestContext
extends com.percussion.server.PSRequestContext
implements com.percussion.server.IPSRequestContext

A system request that overrides the PSRequestContext. Use this class to obtain an IPSRequestContext for the system user (RxServer).

Author:
DavidBenua

Constructor Detail

PSORequestContext

public PSORequestContext()
Gets a the system user request. This system request is always forced to be local to the server, even if the original user request came from elsewhere.

PSORequestContext

public PSORequestContext(java.lang.String CommunityId)
Gets the system user request, specifying a community.

Parameters:
CommunityId -
Method Detail

isTraceEnabled

public boolean isTraceEnabled()
This method always returns false. System requests cannot trace, beccause there is no home application.

Specified by:
isTraceEnabled in interface com.percussion.server.IPSRequestContext
Overrides:
isTraceEnabled in class com.percussion.server.PSRequestContext
See Also:
IPSRequestContext.isTraceEnabled()

setCommunity

public void setCommunity(java.lang.String communityId)
Sets the user community.

Parameters:
communityId - the Community Id to set.
